title: Social Media Literacy Experiential Learning Program: Strengthening Managerial Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Smartphone Usage Skills and Social Media Account Management
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment centered on smartphone-based simulation activities, combining offline workshops with mobile app-based online experiential learning.

learning_goals: Participants can explain criteria for identifying misinformation on social media with 80% accuracy.
Participants can select appropriate response measures in phishing scenario simulations at least twice out of three attempts.
Participants can describe victim support procedures in cyberbullying role-playing scenarios with four or more steps.

resources: Role-Playing Card Set for Offline Workshops
Social Media Case Study Compilation PDF
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
